summary:
Quality made textures with both 1k and 2k textures.
Baked in AO and Quality normal maps without compression artifacts.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rWu98hK.jpg[/img]

My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66043/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Enemies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65610/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dwemer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59563/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Caves[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58461/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragons 4K-8K[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Clouds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42348/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragonborn[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53210/?][font=Arial]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Farmhouses[/font][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49676/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul - Mountains[/url]

-I want to thank you all for supporting me and sending donations.
it's horrible when people think modders who put 100's if not 1000 of hours doesn't deserve compensation.
It has been depressing reading some of those horrible texts on my pages and on other sites on the net. But hey, I ain't one thinking that a bad apple spoils the whole bunch. :)

ATTENTION: DO NOT USE DDSOPT WHILE USING THIS MOD, IT WILL DECREASE THIS MODS QUALITY DRASTICALLY, MY MOD IS OPTIMIZED FROM RELEASE.

Read comment section for changes.
Covered right now: Whole Landscape

I'm a Swedish guy, used to cold and forest like environments.
Some spots in Skyrim looks like Sweden and some don't.

I'm not much for introduction so I go to mod description right away.

I wasn't happy about the landscape textures Skyrim had.
So I decided to make all the textures high quality and lore friendly with a realistic look.

Many other modders forget to optimize their textures causing unnecessary Vram loss.
Some even don't know how to make alphas/normal maps at all.
Some textures looks repeatable which is not good either.

This is where this mod comes in.
Quality made textures with both 1k and 2k textures.
Baked in AO and Quality normal maps without compression artifacts.

Install:
Use NMM or extract to data folder.

Permission :
Ask me for permission to upload or change textures.
author: Frozunswaidon

files.name: Realistic Landscape 1K
files.changelogHtml:
Overhauled snow once again.
Nearly no seams at all or tilling.
A lot more detailed and using new Normal map technique which gives a lot better baking effect.
Some poorly made textures is enhanced.
Overhauled most of the spectacularity for the files so it doesn't get too over bright with enb.
pineforest02 is now using smaller needles as I thought that they were too big.

Snow:
New normalmaps with less bump to make it more seamless, a lot more detailed. New footprints texture and normalmap. The old footprint texture was multicolored and too exaggerated normalmap. Basically, The snow is now real snow, enjoy.

Thanks to community for pointing out what should be better.
Really appreciates that.
